query.name: Pre-Cleanup - Drop ATO Test Database
query.description: Ensures clean state by dropping database from any previous failed run

query.name: Create ATO Test Database and 5 Objects
query.description: Creates test database and 5 objects (tables) for Account Takeover testing
query.query: CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS ato_test_db; USE ato_test_db; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS object1 (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, data VARCHAR(100), created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS object2 (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, data VARCHAR(100), created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS object3 (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, data VARCHAR(100), created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS object4 (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, data VARCHAR(100), created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS object5 (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, data VARCHAR(100), created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)

query.name: Insert Test Data into All Objects
query.description: Insert 1000 records into each of the 5 objects
query.query: USE ato_test_db; INSERT INTO object1 (data) VALUES (CONCAT('Object1 Data ', UUID())); INSERT INTO object2 (data) VALUES (CONCAT('Object2 Data ', UUID())); INSERT INTO object3 (data) VALUES (CONCAT('Object3 Data ', UUID())); INSERT INTO object4 (data) VALUES (CONCAT('Object4 Data ', UUID())); INSERT INTO object5 (data) VALUES (CONCAT('Object5 Data ', UUID()))

query.name: Baseline Hour 1 - Access Object1 Only
query.description: Hour 1 baseline - 50 SELECTs on object1 (normal user behavior)
query.query: SELECT * FROM ato_test_db.object1 WHERE id = FLOOR(1 + RAND() * 1000) LIMIT 10

query.name: Baseline Hour 2 - Access Object1 Only
query.description: Hour 2 baseline - 50 SELECTs on object1 (normal user behavior)
query.query: SELECT * FROM ato_test_db.object1 WHERE id = FLOOR(1 + RAND() * 1000) LIMIT 10

query.name: Baseline Hour 3 - Access Object1 Only
query.description: Hour 3 baseline - 50 SELECTs on object1 (normal user behavior)
query.query: SELECT * FROM ato_test_db.object1 WHERE id = FLOOR(1 + RAND() * 1000) LIMIT 10

query.name: Baseline Hour 4 - Access Object1 Only
query.description: Hour 4 baseline - 50 SELECTs on object1 (normal user behavior)
query.query: SELECT * FROM ato_test_db.object1 WHERE id = FLOOR(1 + RAND() * 1000) LIMIT 10

query.name: ANOMALY SPIKE - Access All 5 Objects
query.description: HOUR 5 ANOMALY: Sudden access to all 5 objects (50 SELECTs each = 250 total) - Account Takeover pattern
query.query: SELECT * FROM ato_test_db.object1 WHERE id = FLOOR(1 + RAND() * 1000) LIMIT 10

query.name: ANOMALY - Access Object2
query.description: Part of ATO spike - accessing object2 (never accessed before)
query.query: SELECT * FROM ato_test_db.object2 WHERE id = FLOOR(1 + RAND() * 1000) LIMIT 10

query.name: ANOMALY - Access Object3
query.description: Part of ATO spike - accessing object3 (never accessed before)
query.query: SELECT * FROM ato_test_db.object3 WHERE id = FLOOR(1 + RAND() * 1000) LIMIT 10

query.name: ANOMALY - Access Object4
query.description: Part of ATO spike - accessing object4 (never accessed before)
query.query: SELECT * FROM ato_test_db.object4 WHERE id = FLOOR(1 + RAND() * 1000) LIMIT 10

query.name: ANOMALY - Access Object5
query.description: Part of ATO spike - accessing object5 (never accessed before)
query.query: SELECT * FROM ato_test_db.object5 WHERE id = FLOOR(1 + RAND() * 1000) LIMIT 10

query.name: Verify ATO Pattern
query.description: Verify record counts in all 5 objects
query.query: SELECT 'object1' as table_name, COUNT(*) as record_count FROM ato_test_db.object1 UNION SELECT 'object2', COUNT(*) FROM ato_test_db.object2 UNION SELECT 'object3', COUNT(*) FROM ato_test_db.object3 UNION SELECT 'object4', COUNT(*) FROM ato_test_db.object4 UNION SELECT 'object5', COUNT(*) FROM ato_test_db.object5
